opendial.gui.utils

Class DomainEditorKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.EditorKit
      • javax.swing.text.DefaultEditorKit
        • javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit
          • opendial.gui.utils.DomainEditorKit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener

    public class DomainEditorKit
extends javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Editor kit for the XML domain specification. The kit provides syntax highlighting, auto-indentation, and auto-completion.

    Credits: part of this code are refactored from the 'bounce' XML editor kit.

    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
